00034 
00035 int InteractionComponentCmp(const InteractionComponent* i1, 
00036                             const InteractionComponent* i2)
00037 {
00038   return (i1->kappa == i2->kappa ? 0 : (i1->kappa < i2->kappa ? -1 : +1));
00039 }
00040

00042 #define BUFSIZE 255
00043 #define MAXCOMPONENTS 2000
00044 
00045 int readInteractionfromFile(Interaction* P, char* fname)
00046 {
00047   FILE* fp;
00048   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00049 
00050   InteractionComponent dummyc[MAXCOMPONENTS];
00051   char dummylabel[MAXCOMPONENTS][LABELSIZE];
00052 
00053   // decompose intname into fname for interaction and possible scaling file
00054   char *fnintp, fnint[80] = "";
00055   char *fnscalep, fnscale[80] = "";
00056   int intscaling = 0;   // scale interaction directly
00057   int mescaling = 0;    // for scaling matrix elements later
00058 
00059   fnintp = strtok(fname, ":"); 
00060   strncpy(fnint, fnintp, 80);
00061   
00062   fnscalep = strtok(NULL, ":"); 
00063   if (fnscalep) {
00064     if (*fnscalep == '*') {
00065       intscaling = 1;
00066       strncpy(fnscale, fnscalep+1, 80);
00067     } else {
00068       mescaling = 1;
00069       strncpy(fnscale, fnscalep, 80);
00070     }
00071   }
00072 
00073   // reading interaction
00074 
00075   if (!(fp = fopen(fnint, "r"))) {
00076     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnint);
00077     return -1;
00078   }
00079 
00080   fprintf(stderr, "... reading Interaction from file %s\n", fnint);
00081 
00082   do
00083     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00084   while (strncmp(buf, "<Interaction", 12) && !feof(fp));
00085   if (feof(fp)) {
00086     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Interaction ...>\n");
00087     return -1;
00088   }
00089 
00090   char Pname[80];
00091   sscanf(buf, "<Interaction %s>", Pname);
00092   strcpy(P->name, stripstr(Pname, ">"));
00093 
00094   char typename[BUFSIZE], label[BUFSIZE];
00095   double gamma, kappa;
00096 
00097   strcpy(dummylabel[0], "sum\n");
00098 
00099   int i=-1;
00100   int ilabel=0;
00101 
00102   while (1) {
00103     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00104     if (feof(fp)) {
00105       fprintf(stderr, "did't find </Interaction>\n");
00106       return -1;
00107     }
00108     if (!strncmp(buf, "</Interaction>", 14))
00109       break;
00110     if (buf[0] == '#' || buf[0] == '\n')
00111       continue;
00112 
00113     i++;
00114     label[0] = '\0';
00115     if (sscanf(buf, "%s %lf %lf %s", typename, &gamma, &kappa, label) < 3) {
00116       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n",
00117               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00118       return -1;
00119     }
00120 
00121     if (label[0]) {
00122       ilabel++;
00123       strncpy(dummylabel[ilabel], label, LABELSIZE);
00124     }
00125 
00126     if (i==0 && ilabel==0) {
00127       fprintf(stderr, "no label defined in first line\n>>%s<<\n",
00128               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00129       return -1;
00130     }
00131 
00132     dummyc[i].gamma = gamma;
00133     dummyc[i].kappa = kappa;
00134     dummyc[i].ilabel = ilabel;
00135 
00136     if (!strcmp(typename,"V"))
00137       dummyc[i].type = V;
00138     else if (!strcmp(typename,"sV"))
00139       dummyc[i].type = sV;
00140     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tV"))
00141       dummyc[i].type = tV;
00142     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tsV"))
00143       dummyc[i].type = tsV;
00144     else if (!strcmp(typename,"p2V"))
00145       dummyc[i].type = p2V;
00146     else if (!strcmp(typename,"sp2V"))
00147       dummyc[i].type = sp2V;
00148     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tp2V"))
00149       dummyc[i].type = tp2V;
00150     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tsp2V"))
00151       dummyc[i].type = tsp2V;
00152     else if (!strcmp(typename,"pr2V"))
00153       dummyc[i].type = pr2V;
00154     else if (!strcmp(typename,"spr2V"))
00155       dummyc[i].type = spr2V;
00156     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tpr2V"))
00157       dummyc[i].type = tpr2V;
00158     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tspr2V"))
00159       dummyc[i].type = tspr2V;

00162     else if (!strcmp(typename,"sVp2"))

00164     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVp2"))
00165       dummyc[i].type = tVp2;
00166     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tsVp2"))
00167       dummyc[i].type = tsVp2;
00168     else if (!strcmp(typename,"Vl2"))
00169       dummyc[i].type = Vl2;
00170     else if (!strcmp(typename,"sVl2"))
00171       dummyc[i].type = sVl2;
00172     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVl2"))
00173       dummyc[i].type = tVl2;
00174     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tsVl2"))
00175       dummyc[i].type = tsVl2;
00176     else if (!strcmp(typename,"Vls"))
00177       dummyc[i].type = Vls;
00178     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVls"))
00179       dummyc[i].type = tVls;
00180     else if (!strcmp(typename,"Vl2ls"))
00181       dummyc[i].type = Vl2ls;
00182     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVl2ls"))
00183       dummyc[i].type = tVl2ls;
00184     else if (!strcmp(typename,"VTll"))
00185       dummyc[i].type = VTll;
00186     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVTll"))
00187       dummyc[i].type = tVTll;
00188     else if (!strcmp(typename,"VTpp"))
00189       dummyc[i].type = VTpp;
00190     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVTpp"))
00191       dummyc[i].type = tVTpp;
00192     else if (!strcmp(typename,"Vl2Tpp"))
00193       dummyc[i].type = Vl2Tpp;
00194     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVl2Tpp"))
00195       dummyc[i].type = tVl2Tpp;
00196     else if (!strcmp(typename,"VT"))
00197       dummyc[i].type = VT;
00198     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tVT"))
00199       dummyc[i].type = tVT;
00200     else if (!strcmp(typename,"prVTrp"))
00201       dummyc[i].type = prVTrp;
00202     else if (!strcmp(typename,"tprVTrp"))
00203       dummyc[i].type = tprVTrp;
00204     else if (!strcmp(typename,"VC")) {
00205       dummyc[i].type = VC;
00206       dummyc[i].gamma = alpha;          // finestructure constant
00207     }
00208     else {
00209       fprintf(stderr, "unknown interaction component %s\n",
00210               typename);
00211       return -1;
00212     }
00213   }
00214   fclose(fp);
00215 
00216   qsort(dummyc, i+1, sizeof(InteractionComponent),
00217         (int (*)(const void*, const void*))InteractionComponentCmp);
00218 
00219   P->ncomponents = i+1;
00220   P->c = (InteractionComponent*) malloc(P->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent));
00221   for (i=0; i<P->ncomponents; i++)
00222     P->c[i] = dummyc[i];
00223 
00224   P->n = ilabel+1;
00225   if (P->n > MAXINTERACTIONS) {
00226     fprintf(stderr, "more then %d labeled interaction components,\nincrease MAXINTERACTIONS in ${FMD}/src/fmd/Interaction.h\n", MAXINTERACTIONS);
00227     return -1;
00228   }
00229 
00230   P->label = malloc(P->n*sizeof(char *));
00231   for (i=0; i<P->n; i++) {
00232     P->label[i] = (char *) malloc(LABELSIZE*sizeof(char));
00233     strncpy(P->label[i], dummylabel[i], LABELSIZE);
00234   }
00235 
00236   P->cm = 0;
00237   P->spinorbit = 0; P->tensor = 0; P->momentump2 = 0; P->momentumpr2 = 0;
00238   P->l2 = 0; P->l2ls = 0; P->tll = 0; P->tpp = 0; P->prtrp = 0; P->l2tpp = 0;
00239 
00240   for (i=0; i<P->ncomponents; i++) {
00241    if (P->c[i].type == Vls || P->c[i].type == tVls)
00242       P->spinorbit = 1;
00243    if (P->c[i].type == Vl2ls || P->c[i].type == tVl2ls)
00244       P->l2ls = 1;
00245    if (P->c[i].type == VT || P->c[i].type == tVT)
00246      P->tensor = 1;
00247    if (P->c[i].type == VTll || P->c[i].type == tVTll)
00248      P->tll = 1;
00249    if (P->c[i].type == VTpp || P->c[i].type == tVTpp)
00250      P->tpp = 1;
00251    if (P->c[i].type == Vl2Tpp || P->c[i].type == tVl2Tpp)
00252      P->l2tpp = 1;
00253    if (P->c[i].type == prVTrp || P->c[i].type == tprVTrp)
00254      P->prtrp = 1;
00255    if (P->c[i].type >= Vl2 && P->c[i].type <= tsVl2)
00256      P->l2 = 1;
00257    if (P->c[i].type >= p2V && P->c[i].type <= tsp2V || 
00258        P->c[i].type >= Vp2 && P->c[i].type <= tsVp2)
00259      P->momentump2 = 1;
00260    if (P->c[i].type >= pr2V && P->c[i].type <= tspr2V)
00261      P->momentumpr2 = 1;
00262   }
00263 
00264 
00265   // read scaling parameters
00266 
00267   if (intscaling || mescaling) {
00268 
00269     P->scale = malloc(P->n*sizeof(double));
00270     for (i=0; i<P->n; i++)
00271       P->scale[i] = 1.0;
00272 
00273     if (!(fp = fopen(fnscale, "r"))) {
00274       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnscale);
00275       return -1;
00276     }
00277 
00278     fprintf(stderr, "... reading Scaling from file %s\n", fnscale);
00279 
00280     do
00281       fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00282     while (strncmp(buf, "<Scaling", 8) && !feof(fp));
00283     if (feof(fp)) {
00284       fprintf(stderr, "did not find <Scaling ...>\n");
00285       return -1;
00286     }
00287 
00288     char Pname[80], Sname[80];
00289     sscanf(buf, "<Scaling %s %s>", Pname, Sname);
00290     if (strcmp(P->name, Pname)) {
00291       fprintf(stderr, "Interaction does not match\n");
00292       return -1;
00293     }
00294     strcpy(P->scname, stripstr(Sname, ">"));
00295 
00296     double scale;
00297     while (1) {
00298       fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00299 
00300       if (feof(fp)) {
00301         fprintf(stderr, "did't find </Scaling>\n");
00302         return -1;
00303       }
00304       if (!strncmp(buf, "</Scaling>", 10))
00305         break;
00306       if (buf[0] == '#' || buf[0] == '\n')
00307         continue;
00308 
00309       if (sscanf(buf, "%s %lf", label, &scale) < 2) {
00310         fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n",
00311                 stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00312         return -1;
00313       }
00314 
00315       for (i=0; i<P->n; i++) {
00316         if (!strcmp(P->label[i], label)) {
00317           P->scale[i] = scale;
00318           break;
00319         }
00320       }
00321 
00322 
00323     }
00324 
00325     fprintf(stderr, "Scaling parameters: \n");
00326     for (i=1; i<P->n; i++) {
00327       fprintf(stderr, "%s %8.3f\n", P->label[i], P->scale[i]);
00328     }
00329   }
00330 
00331   // mescaling: 
00332   if (mescaling) {
00333     fprintf(stderr, "scaling parameters for matrix elements\n");
00334     P->mescaling = 1;
00335   } else
00336     P->mescaling = 0;
00337 
00338   // intscaling
00339   if (intscaling) {
00340     fprintf(stderr, "scaling interaction\n");
00341     strcat(P->name, ":");
00342     strcat(P->name, P->scname);
00343 
00344     // scale interaction components
00345     for (i=0; i<P->ncomponents; i++) {
00346       P->c[i].gamma *= P->scale[P->c[i].ilabel];
00347     }
00348   }
00349 
00350   return 0;
00351 }
